lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.
You are with ${loverName} and the two of you are getting romantic. You are alone in his room, and his parents aren't home.
${loverName} looks at you glassy-eyed and tells you, "I think we should try it."
${loverName} says, "I love you and you love me. What's there to be ready for?"
"How can you get me all hot and bothered like that and say 'no' to me?"
#GRIT YOUR TEETH AND SAY, "I JUST SAID IT," AND WALK OUT
"Aw, come on. I didn't mean anything by it." ${loverName} is calling after you.
#TELL HIM YOU'LL STAY WITH HIM ONLY IF HE QUITS BOTHERING YOU
#TELL HIM JUST TO KISS YOU BUT THAT'S ALL
The next day, he calls up and apologizes.
The rest of the afternoon is awkward. He blames it on your coldness.
The two of you kiss and ${loverName} begins to move his hands all over your body. He is beginning to breathe heavy.
He doesn't want to slow down. He begins to unbutton your blouse.
#TELL HIM IN NO UNCERTAIN TERMS TO CUT IT OUT
The two of you begin to have sex. He is still very rough and inexperienced. He is not a sensitive lover -- at least not this time.
You are eager to please him and eager to be pleased. The two of you explore each other's bodies and experiment with different techniques. After you are finished, do you feel guilty?
Perhaps you should think harder about what you're doing first. Now that you have satisfied your curiosity, perhaps you will think of it differently next time.
